author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

Follow-up of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29830. I found a few more bugs while validating the CCLUT algorithm and the GEM trigger primitives in simulation.

#### PR validation:

Tested with Run-3 MC samples in various CMSSW_11_2_X pre-releases.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

@tahuang1991
title: Bugfixes in simtrack to GEM/CSC digi and stub matching
